alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:46PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Otero and central Crowley Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 845 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles north of Ordway to Crowley. Movement was southeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Manzanola, Ordway and Sugar City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County
